text:
Hello,
Today i would like to present you why i choose to learn information
and communication. In my social life i'am a shy person but all
the same i like talk and exange whith other person. I choose the
communication because in the futur i would like work for a little
company and help her for grow up whith communication. Before choose
my field of study i see an
guidance counselor and she help me for choose what makes me happyer
in my profesional life. I choose communication because is a essential
domaine for any company, but personaly i really like fashion and
beauty. So i prefere work for a company in this domain. That was i
think before start my studies. Maybe during my curriculum i will have
some experience they will change my mind. The colledge is for that.
For build your orientation. The domain of the licence information and
communication is really big and he gift the possibility to work in a
big diversity of job. That something really inportant when you not
sure about what you wanna do in the futur. In addition the licence
information and communication open a lot of dore for many job.  It is
for all this reason i chosse to learn information and communication.
